website_summaries.verdict: This 2-in-1 boots up fast and has the quality and features you'd expect in a more expensive model.
pros: Large 15.6-inch touchscreen that offers 1920 x 1080 resolution
Features 12GB memory, a 256GB SSD hard drive, and an SDXC card reader
cons: Some buyers report problems with booting, the battery not charging, and other issues within a few months

customer_reviews.title: do not let them dupe you into spending wasted time on technical support
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: Acer does not have a warranty department. If you have a hardware issue with your purchase when you receive it, do not let them dupe you into spending wasted time on technical support. Insist on sending the computer in for a repair if necessary. Be persistent, and you may reach somebody helpful. DO NOT LET THEM convince you that you need to pay for the repair. That said, sound quality was terrible on arrival. I have been wrestling with their phone support to get this thing sent in for repairs. We've had it less than 24 hours. I may be returning this instead of getting it repaired, as it seems to be less of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: John Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Lemon
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard quit working eight months after I bought it. On mine help very unhelpful. I had to send the entire computer back to the factory to have him look at it. I had to send it back AT MY EXPENSE. Estimated turnaround time for repairs three weeks. This is unacceptable. Incidentally, before contacting their repair, I contacted local shops here. None of them would touch Acer and none of them had anything good to say about the brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Computer science major. Gamer.
customer_reviews.text: As of right this moment the computer Is perfect no issues. I ran visual studios and elder scrolls online simultaneously and it ran seamless. The video quality is A 1 and I love how quickly it operates. The keyboard is backlit. Such a plus. Tablet mode is completely epic. It’s super light for the size it is and I’m very happy with my purchase. If you are hesitant like I was about 700$ don’t be it’s a complete purchase and I’m happy with what I got. Will be updating a month down the line to see where we are at and how she’s performing. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Hareleah Murphy-Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow and Unresponsive Computer
customer_reviews.text: For a brand new, higher powered computer, this is one of the slowest, worst responding computers I have used. I will be returning this and will probably never go with Acer again. Right out of the box it will have programs that are "Not Responding". It is fast to start up, but that is all I can say about this computer. I would not recommend for anyone to buy this. Although the specifications look good, the speed on paper does not match up to the practical speed. Maybe I got a lemon, but I would buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: Received defective item
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this laptop for my birthday; however it's defective. The screen showed " no bootable device" after initial set up. Acer customer support cound't help to fix through the phone and I had to repair it on my own shipping expense. I decided to return the item. It's just too much trouble to send it back and forth .
customer_reviews.author: CHIA CHING TU

customer_reviews.title: For : Gaming & Industrial Design , it was just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a replacement for a few months, I finally found something that had better than average specs and a good quality overall. The best part about it, the screen quality and overall feeling of robustness of the laptop, even though is a convertible one. Pros Amazing Screen Quality Can it handle Adobe programs, several at the same time?: Yes! Can it handle Blender, Solidworks? : Yes! Can it handle games like Star Wars Battlefront, Bioshock Infinite or Assasins Creed, with above low graphics? Yes! Battery Life Touch Screen Cons No optical drive. No touch- pen for the screen
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: It is horrible. Pages open on their own
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a mess. It jumps all over the place and you can't even think of using a mouse with it. It is horrible. Pages open on their own. Expensive mistake on my part!
customer_reviews.author: Melva Gressley

customer_reviews.title: Screen died 14 months after purchase, ACER wants another $450 to repair it
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. Great Laptop for the first year of ownership. However 14 months later the screen wouldn't turn on. At first I thought it was just a bad battery. However, after hours of trouble shooting potential issues without success I brought it in to a local repair shop and was told the screen was the likely component causing the issue. When I tried to get it repaired through ACER they told me it would be $450 to send it in...which is over 50% of the cost that I bought the laptop for. This was by far the worst customer support I have experienced with any company. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Smith

customer_reviews.title: a great laptop all around
customer_reviews.text: amazing vivid and bright display. the tuoch works just fine, though it's not always as comfortable as the trackpad or mouse. the entire thing just screams quality and it is a very sturdy and rigid laptop as well as slim and low profile. the only downside to this laptop is the battery, it's not bad, it lasts around 5 to 6 hours on regular use, one of the main reasons to buy this piece over others was the claim to have 9-hour battery life. although the battery won't last all day, the charging brick is tiny and very portable. all and all a very nice laptop, definitely a great buy and I'm super satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: yuval levy

customer_reviews.title: Died Within Two Years
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this item until I wasn't, and could kick myself many, many times for using my Amazon Prime Store Card, and not purchasing any extended protection. I spent more than $200 for diagnostics and repairs, in two separate visits, when the computer wouldn't turn on. We assumed it was a battery problem until - on my third visit - the technician inspected it more thoroughly, and figured out that the entire "board" is damaged, and I need a replacement. Caveat Emptor!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe City Girl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Windows 10 Machine
customer_reviews.text: The computer is awesome--it really performs. However, this is the second computer I've tried with windows 10 and for ME windows 7 functions more efficiently and easier. IN both of my windows 10 pc's, they routinely get 'hung-up" when on the internet and performing functions that require interfacing with other projects on-line. But, the computer itself is awesome...unsure what I'm going to do with it -- it was expensive. If windows 10 works for you, then this computer will get you there fast and in style. Boot-up time was usually 15-seconds or less!
customer_reviews.author: CTSIA-100

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop with some features that cannot get 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop with some features that cannot get 5 stars. Pretty heavy. Very fast performance. Some bloatware but not very noticeable due to its speed and memory load out. The charging connection is the small plug type which seems fragile. Otherwise initially great laptop and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: My first acer.. my last acer. This laptop is absolute garbage. So, out of the blue it shuts down. I started it back up and nope.. just a blue flashing power light. I hit the battery reset button and tried rebooting. Nope. Mind you, I have had this since May of this year. Never again.. back to Dell laptops.
customer_reviews.author: gEdin1983

customer_reviews.title: Have yet to get the bluetooth to work properly
customer_reviews.text: I have had this computer since August, overall a nice small light weight device. I like the touch screen and tablet function. My biggest gripe is the Bluetooth to work properly. The syste identifies my device but never connects. I have contacted ACER customer service through the website and read the suggestions, nothing has worked. I have downloaded bluetooth drivers and abolutely nothing works. I would not buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: run4now

customer_reviews.title: Really good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Really good laptop but not a lot of support with accessories. Tried looking for a skin and it was almost like this laptop doesn't exist. If you don't care about 3rd party accessory support then definitely buy this, it's a really good laptop otherwise. The battery life is standard at around 5-7 hours of YouTube/playing small games like slay the spire. I have notice a weird quirk where sometimes it will randomly open a link/click on an icon when scrolling with the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ian	Buyerman

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Acer laptop stopped working in about 9 months of moderate usage (The laptop was used on average for about 30-60mins in a day). Note that Acer has only one service center in the US and has a horrible customer support process. They expect the customers to incur the mailing cost for the defective laptop. The laptop looks, feels and performs very good but has absolutely no life. It's a complete waste of money. I would strongly recommend reading the company reviews online before you decide to waste 800$ on Acer.
customer_reviews.author: yogesh maheshwari

customer_reviews.title: I don't think that anyone would be dissappointed with this computer, you can do everything with it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome computer I have ever owned. This computer is lightweight, very thin, and responds quickly. I have had several computers in the past, and I must say that this one is my favorite. I use a lot of apps, and plan on using this computer to learn other computer languages. I am sure this computer can handle this task with out any problem. As for games, it made game playing more fun. The audio/visual effects of the games come through beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: jujamsamsu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The SDD gave up just 4 days before the warranty expired. Honestly I thought the warranry is 1 year but not...6 months and now I know why. I sent the product to be fixed and forgot an SD Card 128 GB inserted. The product came back with 32 GB SD Card instead . Wondering about all sensitive data technicians might have access. A shame for ACER and would not buy anything again. The first and last product Acer I ever owned. Too bad .
customer_reviews.author: V. L

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Only works for one year
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the laptop for work on May 27th 2018. On June 5th 2019 the screen started to randomly shut off while i was working and the speakers stopped working. ACER would not even talk to me since the warranty was only for one year. They wanted to charge me to talk to customer support in India. This is a scam and will stop working as soon as the warranty is up. I work for Tech Magazine and will be publishing an article about this scam. DO NOT BUY FROM ACER!
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction, Crisp Screen, Fast, verry little bloatware. other than Microsoft's distribution garb.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Kind of wish it had expansion options of a 500 GB SDD when I purchased, but it has a vibrant display, speedy startup, and all the USB ports I could want. The size seems a bit large when in tablet mode, but that is not an issue. It is funny, but this is the first time I ordered a PC/laptop without considering the optical drive, and I am not sorry about it. Great PC with good horsepower for all activities.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dolby

customer_reviews.title: Negative on flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I like this laptop all around for performance and battery life. Two primary cons for this laptop are the following. This is a touch screen laptop that do not allow any of the smart touch pens to work with it. This computer does not allow you to dual boot in any way shape or form. (I wish I could return it to get a computer that could do those two things but it's too late now.) Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: JayJay

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop! The screen is gorgeous, the keyboard is a great size, the touchpad is very responsive, the specs are more than plenty for all we do. While I did have one small issue with the WIFI going out for a few days, it may have been software because I haven't had an issue since. I purchased another for someone else at our company and he loves his as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer. It would not complete the start up process and I returned it to be replaced. The replacement did not work either. DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replacement laptop works great!
customer_reviews.text: First laptop received was DOA. After unsuccessfully trouble shooting with Acer, I ultimately just worked with Amazon to replace it. The second one worked just fine. I’ve only been using his laptop for a week so this is a preliminary review. So far, I’m very happy with this purchase. For the money, this laptop is well equipped. After loading everything I needed on it, it can still power on and be ready for use in 8 seconds! Time will tell how long it lasts. Yes, the fan is on quite a bit, but that happens with thin laptops like this. Doesn’t bother me too much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Misc_User_T

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Such a great computer. I had my boyfriend look over the specs (cause I'm not the most tech savvy) and he said the specs were pretty incredible for the price. I bought mine used and it still came basically brand new. No issues yet. I love laying down and using it as a tablet propped open. Runs super fast and it is very skinny. Still need to delete some extra programs. I will be using this for school and for some light gaming. Overall great computer and I'm very happy! Update: 3 months in and the battery is dead :( It only works while plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: cschneeman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive all around!
customer_reviews.text: I am upgrading from a couple year old $1500 Asus and could not be happier. The screen is beautiful and bright and the laptop battery life if amazing. Build quality is superb and beautiful nothing about it feels cheap. The 12gb of ram, dedicated video card and the SSD make for one extremely fast machine. It came with NO BLOATWARE which was a nice surprise. I have no complaints about this laptop and and extremely happy with my purchase. Highly, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brett P.

customer_reviews.title: USB C Port Is Dead Pretty Quickly
customer_reviews.text: My only complain about this product is that the USB Type-C port on this laptop is dead within four months of regular use. And since I'm moved abroad, it's unlikely to get service for my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, it's just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it's just what I needed. The fan is boarder line loud when you have a lot going on, but it's way quieter than the laptops of years past. Back-lit and layout of Keyboard is just right, screen is bright and clear.
customer_reviews.author: OCD Tronic

customer_reviews.title: I did an exhaustive research looking for an economic and a good laptop (which I have to say
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought it, I did an exhaustive research looking for an economic and a good laptop (which I have to say, are two requirements difficult to find in a single laptop). This is the best option I could find because it allows me to browse, work in AutoCad and Photoshop all at the same time. It is SUPER fast, the speakers are fine and the backlit keyboard is awesome. There is nothing I can review about the flip or touchscreen function because I barely use it. So It's been a month since I got the laptop and I am absolutely satisfied with it. You will not find something better for less price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J.

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like the design and the feel of this laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the design and the feel of this laptop. Wish it worked more like an Android or iPhone when in tablet mode, but it's not all that bad. The built-in camera is not really all that clear though. Kinda fuzzy, watermark like. I wonder if that is how it is supposed to be. If so than I can probably live with it, but my cell phone looks better with skype.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this computer so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this computer to replace an older one that was upgraded from Windows 8 to Windows 10, nothing but problems! This Acer is well built and very fast. Best of all I don't have all the Windows problems I had with the old one. I have had a problem with the log in screen. It will not recognize my fingerprint most of the time, then says my pin is wrong, and sometimes doesn't even like my password! After 3 weeks of fighting it I disabled ALL log ins.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Warren

customer_reviews.title: Development Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this laptop for some light gaming and development. Runs games like League of Legends and Fortnite with stable frame rate. IDE's run smoothly, i.e. Visual Studio, Android Studio. The keyboard is nice and the computer has a good general appearance. I do like the tablet mode a lot more than I figure I would have before I tried it. I did not notice this before I purchased but to find out that this laptop does not have an Ethernet connection was slightly disappointing. Overall I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for its size, a few things that take away from user experience
customer_reviews.text: Overall good performance, processor is fast, graphics are good enough to play games on low to medium setting, startup times with the ssd are fast. The hinges don't hold as well as I'd like, sometimes when I pick the laptop up the screen will move. If you press down beside the trackpads it will mess with the functionality of the trackpads. Also the backlit keyboard doesn't stay on all the time, just for a few seconds after a key press. Couldn't find a way to change that. I'd recommend it if you're looking for something that's a 2in1 that actually has some decent power.
customer_reviews.author: John Gilbody

customer_reviews.title: Best I Ever Had. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this laptop for almost 5 months and would say this is one of the best purchases I have ever made. For the price, the build quality is really good. It has a decent display, great sound, and enough RAM, CPU and GPU power for my needs. It performed well on everyday use with some programming and light gaming. From experience, I can never find another laptop in the same price range that offers the same or better features in terms of display, sound, RAM, CPU, GPU, and etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so my parents.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my (not technologically inclined) parents for Christmas. They love the touch screen (something they didn’t want at first). It is easy to use and operate. Came in perfect condition. I personally love how it folds into a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I like it, just don't love it. It works but runs a bit slow and I've had to send it back because of a battery issue. The warranty company is good to work with, but its an inconvenience non the less.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lee Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for 9 months and have had 0 issues. Pros: - Build quality - Performance and efficiency - Touchscreen responsiveness - Screen quality - Battery life - Responsive keyboard and trackpad - Many I/O ports - Strong WiFi adapter - Decent speakers and microphone Cons: - Maybe camera?
customer_reviews.author: Parashar

customer_reviews.title: The screen is very vivid and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It is very fast compared to my prior Lenovo laptop which was about 4-5 yrs old. The screen is very vivid and easy to read. It feels very sturdy to me and I love the touch screen. I use this product primarily for business and research and it works great. I never realized how much a light up keyboard would be a bonus. Cons: I hate the touch pad. It's so finicky and causes a lot of issues when researching something online or trying to copy and paste text. I tried turning off scroll and it's still tetchy. You have to be very specific how you tap it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelkat9

customer_reviews.title: Works Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and installed all my software without any problems. Everything works like a charm, including WiFI (at home and corporate client) and MiFi (tethering to my AT&T Samsung 8). Using Cortana via voice command or touch screen is great so I don't have to hunt and peck to find out where the heck Windows 10 stores its various options (e.g., "Control Panel"). Speed is excellent for a laptop. Of course, its durability will be tested over time (will post about this at a later date).
customer_reviews.author: PeterD

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! I wish I could get a refund!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for less than 2 years. It does not have a lot of space to begin. HOWEVER, out of nowhere I turned my computer on and it had a black screen with “no bootable device” across the screen. I googled, YouTubed, asked others...tried getting help from Acer and they told me I have reached warranty deadline. I will never buy an acer again.
customer_reviews.author: LARISSA SUTHERLAND/HARPER KNEAFSEY

customer_reviews.title: I lost everything
customer_reviews.text: I purchased your Acer in December 2017, and it started beeping recently. I took it in to Best Buy for service, and it has battery, plug in port and other issues that has rendered it trash. The hard drive won't read and I've lost everything. I purchased one for a present in 2019 and am now afraid issues will render it trash as well. This is an expensive and frustrating experience. I have never had computer issues with a laptop less than 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First laptop was broken; second was great
customer_reviews.text: I order one of these laptops this past month and the first one arrived in inadequate condition. As soon as I got it out of the box and charged it, it would freeze upon startup and when it did actually load, it had the blue screen of death. We tried everything to fix it but it did not work. I decided to return that one and order a new one. The second laptop was great! Definitely worth the money since it is so fast and looks nice. It has the great qualities of a 2-in-1 without paying too much money.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Naumann

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this laptop. You definitely get what you pay for with this. Very sturdy construction, very easy use and set up. The wifi on this works so well. Especially compared to my old computer which was a cheap HP laptop. Note: I mainly use this for music, internet browsing and movie streaming and it does the job amazingly well. however, my boyfriend has downloaded WoW on here and said it runs very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY!!Need repair for n less than a month.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this August 2, 2018 Need it repaired August 21,2018 I’m getting a blue screen when I log in I searched “acre blue screen” and it seems this problem may be common. Now I’m searching for Acer support and that’s not an easy thing to find. I DETESTthis computer and this company. But this is the way it is now days. Consumers get crap, corps. get profits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Acer does not honor warranty on Amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE ACER ON AMAZON. Direct from Acer: Hi there. Acer warranty are usually 1 to 2 years depending on the unit you will buy. Please look for Warranty details in the Amazon page you are on to check the warranty coverage. We can only confirm the warranty of units purchased from an Acer website. If you are unsure of the warranty coverage of the unit available in Amazon, it will be better to buy the unit from an Acer website or Acer online store. NO WARRANTY...and you are definitely gonna need it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laptop I have ever used. I am very happy I spent the extra money to get exactly what I wanted instead of cheaping out. I rarely use the touch screen, but it does come in handy. With the SSD it boots up and is ready to work in about 4-7 seconds depending on what program I open. I really couldn't ask for anything more
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 7 months
customer_reviews.text: 7 months after buying the product, the hinge separated from the case. The power button fell in, and it won't turn on. Never dropped, always careful, used the tablet mode maybe twice. In the repair shop now, $200 to fix. Will never buy an Acer again. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: svasan

customer_reviews.title: Fast start up, long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have not found a single thing that I dislike about this laptop. It powers up super fast, I've had it in my lap for hours and it doesn't get hot on the bottom. The backlit keyboard is just the thing for working in low light. The display is bright and and clear. There is a good bit of reflective glare on the screen but I added a screen protector to it and that was eliminated. It does everything I need it to do for returning to college after 15 years. Super happy with this laptop
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all-purpose laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all-purpose laptop for the price. Only giving it 4 start because it is not stylus friendly, at all. No compatibility for for smart styluses (as described in the product details), terrible with standard rubber tip (I have tried 7-8 different types). Also, I might have given it 5 stars if not for the very loud fan. It kicks into high gear for programs that one would not think necessary. Overall, a fine product that came out of the box ready to go and is performing very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Seidman

customer_reviews.title: which is useful to increase the proformance and disk space
customer_reviews.text: The speed of the machine is really facinating. It also comes with a software that helps us to mange and clean files, which is useful to increase the proformance and disk space. The only downside, for me, is that you can only connect to internet via wifi. I also read that most of R series laptops doesn't work well with digitizer pens, not sure if it is true with R 15 as I haven't tested it.
customer_reviews.author: Ujith K.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want to use it for the internet!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how a great laptop can be ruined by something as small as a wireless adapter. The Qualcomm adapter on this laptop is the worst. It causes the laptop to crash, has to constantly be reset, and when it does connect has plenty of issues. I thought I could fix it but I haven't found a working solution and my return window has closed. I am livid about all of this and basically wasted $800 to have to go and purchase a new computer.
customer_reviews.author: Amenra B.

customer_reviews.title: Acer doesnt have continued support for this product
customer_reviews.text: The graphics card on the computer will not function with most games and programs that could use it. It is a fault with the way the computer tries to use it and renders all games and modeling software unusable. You will need to deactivate the nvidia 940mx gpuin device manager in order to use most programs beyond microsoft word and your web browser. It may sound like I have a faulty unit, but I gaurantee you its not. Acer simply doesnt support the product on any level. Do not spend money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer. 12G RAM makes running virtual machines a breeze. Very nice for travel and work.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Swift

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but something bad happened to me
customer_reviews.text: If I can describe this laptop with 7 words it will be AMAZING...! Has power, it is speedy, I made videos once every 2 weeks with Filmora and never freeze. I use to play Fifa 2019 and was really smooth, but the BAD thing is the battery. I bought this in January 2019 and I use it 12 hours daily. Today is October 21, 2019, and the battery died. So, I have to work with an electric plugged all day. The bad situation, I am really far from the USA and here don't have any Acer customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Palomo

customer_reviews.title: Not happy right now
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box the pc will not load windows. Called Acer and now I have to wait on a recovery USB. Ugh! Very upsetting. I will allow a few days before sending this back
customer_reviews.author: ZEYDA

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I ever got her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. Way over the top for her technology-wise, but its flexibility has proven indispensable to the point where she's learning about the technology rather than being disinterested in it! Nice unit, too - I wouldn't mind it if it were my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is perfect for my daily use. The sound is good, the video is good, speed is good, the size and weight is good. I can't see any reason why I cant this a big 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Keo1336

customer_reviews.title: good screen and keyboard
customer_reviews.text: been using this computer for 3 months now. Solid, no issues. Quick, Light, good screen and keyboard. It even plays games such as PUBG and warthunder thanks to the dedicated graphics card.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Good value. No bloatware to speak of
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the specs for the price. Ordered two for my kids on prime day when it was an additional $100 off. Good value. No bloatware to speak of, just uninstalled a few apps. Great student pc and good for light to moderate gaming like minecraft and roblox, maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: coben

customer_reviews.title: Great computer. Running Windows 10 much faster than the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great computer. Running Windows 10 much faster than the computer supplied by employer. Good screen and audio., keyboard feels good. Does absolutely everything I need. This is one of the better computers I've used and I have been using them since they were punch card controlled. At this time there have been no problems with this computer and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop except for the fact that the power button ...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop except for the fact that the power button would just collapse in and become non-functional. Had it repaired the first time no problem, easiest RMA ever. When it happened again less than 2 weeks later it wasn't so easy. My only option was an 80% refund or a broken laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a while now and the screen is holding out well, no problems associated with flippy lapTablets have manifested thus far. Only drawback is windows 10
customer_reviews.author: dunga

customer_reviews.title: Fast laptop with plenty of memory. The folding screen is awesome. Touchscreen laptop!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome laptop. It works very well. It starts up quickly and there is plenty of ram on it. I love the folding screen and I use it all the time switching from pc mode for work to tablet mode when I want to play games. This is a touchscreen laptop and I love that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Frith Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Functional 2 In 1 Laptop For The Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this a great 2 in 1 laptop especially when you consider the hardware. It is extremely functional to use in multiple settings whether at a desk, on the go, or when combined with other devices. I highly recommend this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Walter K.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding 2-in-1 Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: More than meet our expectations. We got it for our son for college and he loves it. From streaming videos, to video chats with his friends and, of course, using it like a conventional laptop. It does it all very well!
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Good but noisy
customer_reviews.text: It is generally a good computer, if it wasn't for the irritating noise from the fan. It was slightly heavier for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ib

customer_reviews.title: It won't last the year
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for nearly a year, but originally I had to replace the first product, and it hardly works anymore: what with all the blue screening, the touchpad bubbling, and the fan becoming so loud I can hardly hear youtube videos. Honestly, I don't understand how even a replaced product can be this defective, extremely disappointing as otherwise this laptop could be great!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all cost
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews but this is bad, product is a lemon. Buzzing within a day and unable to download basic gaming programs. Avoid it at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1
customer_reviews.text: This is a great convertible computer. I bought it for my wife after her old HP decided to give us troubles. The touchscreen is responsive and picture is very good. I may end up buying one for myself since my computers on fritz too. The only drawback with this two in one is that it does not have a DVD player. Maybe I'm just old school but it's nice to be able to burn a CD or DVD and give it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Helsmoortel

customer_reviews.title: faulty ram.. defective product.. and the ...
customer_reviews.text: faulty ram.. defective product .. and the customer service is only valid in USA.. what a shame to ACER company.. it`s written worldwide warranty but its a big lie !! unfortunately i`m not able to return this item because I already gave it as a present.. don`t buy this product if you will be in another country.. now I have to buy a 12 gb ram myself and replace it for this so-called brand new product......
customer_reviews.author: dogus baris bilgi

customer_reviews.title: This computer has NEVER WORKED CORRECTLY..😞
customer_reviews.text: We are now sending this BACK for a second time.. has not worked correctly at all.. extremely furious with this whole situation and how the company has handled this!! I had to buy my son a computer to hold him over because they don’t really seem to care about their customer service... very upsetting...
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Virzi

customer_reviews.title: Lap Top
customer_reviews.text: Love my new lap top always wanted one and finally can say that I own one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I must first say that i bought this laptop about a year ago (it was on sale). I love the keyboard, and the fingerprint sign in, but i wasn't too keen on the touchpad at first. i mostly use it for teaching and browsing, so i haven't been using any heavy software or games (too busy with work and school). the 15 inch screen can be too big for some, but i like it, since i don't take mylaptop out much (it's a bit heavy and big) the touchscreen is amazing, and the battery so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eman

customer_reviews.title: Good equipment... but with a defect
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expert at all but in general terms I believe this is a quite good equipment. The only problem was that I received it with like a little crak inside the screen. I was very afraid that it would get larger along the time but, at least after 4 months, the crak keeps the same size. Unfortunately I don't live in the US, so claiming under the warranty was out of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Pablo Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Defective batteries
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these and had battery issues with both. The first one was dead on arrival - the computer would not recognize the battery. The second worked fine for just a month before getting the same problem. On top of that, Acer customer support wanted us to pay for shipping the defective item back to get it repaired (and that takes several weeks). I highly recommend NOT buying this computer.
customer_reviews.author: mytofu

customer_reviews.title: ... review but I just wanted to say that I like this computer a lot
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe that I'm writing a review but I just wanted to say that I like this computer a lot. It's quiet, fast, runs cool. I just write emails, shop and watch HBO NOW on it. I love the back lit keyboard and the touch screen. Also the computer boots up in under 5 seconds every time. So glad I found this computer. It does what I need it to do and I've not had any problems with it in the 5 or 6 months that I've owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Good laptop for every day use. However, i had it only for a few months and already noticing 'freezing' up time to time..screen gets white spots on the side , overall nice quality, runs, screen touch is great and keyboard is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: As far as I've had it, it's been an amazing computer. Great for gaming, watching kovies, or writing a novel. Only complaint is the volume sometimes gets SLIGHTLY quieter sometimes, for about 15 min's or so, then restore to perfect quality. Still, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KaibaCorp

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and no issues
customer_reviews.text: I've had this computer since 2018 and it stills works great, I haven't had major issues. The battery won't last like the first year of course, but I can go like 3-4 hours straight without having to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Capellán D01 047915

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this as the hard drive died while I was setting it up
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: I love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop. I wanted something both thin and powerful and it has both qualities. ONLY complaint I have is that the mouse trackpad could be better.. I do like the fingerprint scanner though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_Bak

customer_reviews.title: Lovely machine. Hope to continue buying Acer in the future.
customer_reviews.text: I feel it's a bit slow. But it could be the internet connection.nice presentation. The setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second one has a great screen when it comes to color
customer_reviews.text: My second one has a great screen when it comes to color, fast every few problems. Good screen size for me can be used as a notebook style. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Bigdodgediesel

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for architecture student!
customer_reviews.text: I am an architecture student and bought this laptop to run revit, autocad, and 3Dmax. It’s work perfectly so far, I have to take it to school and it isn’t heavy at all. I really love the design and that it has such a big display. Wasn’t to excited about the tablet mode but I’ve come to like it a lot. Great computer and great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Jose Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Love the computer and the features. Only problem is I got it brand new from Amazon and the touch screen wouldn't work. I couldn't get anything to work. Called Acer and they sent me a shipping label to send to them to fix. Had it back within a week. Works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniferlynn771

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for almost 2 years now and couldn't be more happier with it! No major problems really in all this while..my only biggest disappointment if any is windows 10 operating system..it sucks to the core and has so many inbuilt bugs; but that shouldn't take anything away from the laptop as such.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: it's leagues better than the Alienware it replaced (mind you that one ...
customer_reviews.text: I live this laptop with all my heart, it's leagues better than the Alienware it replaced (mind you that one was 6 yrs old) and it suits my diverse lifestyle, just wish it had more storage space
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Try Again With the Touchpad
customer_reviews.text: Touchpad being off center like it is and the fact that it is too sensitive to a palm being on it makes this computer frustrating to use.
customer_reviews.author: wildcatgoal

customer_reviews.title: Love the touchscreen and vividness of the display
customer_reviews.text: Flawless so far. Love the touchscreen and vividness of the display. Using it in tablet mode is a little cumbersome because it's so big, but that's to be expected due to the size. The lightup keyboard is a nice feature and I don't have any problems with the touchpad or the fingerprint reader. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for 25 days and it was great until it had an issue with the battery saying “plugged in but not charging” would turn off after I removed the charger. Sent the computer in for repair and it was returned with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Nvidia geforce 940mx graphics card
customer_reviews.text: Nvidia geforce 940mx graphics card last less than 8 months :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop! Surprisingly
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop! Surprisingly, this laptop is great for gaming, work and browsing. It can handle games like Fortnite and Overwatch with ease.
customer_reviews.author: jason harvey

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance
customer_reviews.text: It can get a little loud sometimes but the performance has been excellent so far. I don't use the touch screen much but it's nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Karma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop; big , clear screen and top of the line performance at half the price of the Surface or other big brand laptops
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle. Love having a touch screen. Still on. a honeymoon . Will let you know in a few mo this. Love love it now!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Fish

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for online school. I couldn’t be happier! I did a lot of research on computers to buy this one and have been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best laptop I have used in a while
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best laptop I have used in a while. the SSD with Win10 starts up faster than a tablet. Battery life is excellent. HD screen is very nice on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S. Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent functionality with the ability of using as a tablet perfect for daily routine use
customer_reviews.author: ChiefTain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent laptop. Love the tablet mode. Light and easily portable. Good battery life. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Chandru

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: USING ABOUT AN YEAR BUT ONE OF LETTERS IN THE KEY BOARD IS NOT WORKING. IT IS LITERALLY 20 DAYS OVER MY 1 YEAR WARRANTY PERIOD AND THIS LAP TOP CAN'T BE COVERED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Acer Aspire R 15 2-in-1 Laptop, 15.6" Full HD Touch, 7th Gen Intel Core i7, GeForce 940MX, 12GB DDR4, 256GB SSD, R5-571TG-7229
product_meta.description: Style:Laptop OnlyAcer R5-571TG-7229 comes with these high level specs: 7th Generation Intel Core i7-7500U Processor 2.7GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.5GHz (4MB L3 cache), Windows 10 Home, 15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) widescreen LED-backlit IPS display - Multi-touch screen, supporting 10-finger touch, NVIDIA GeForce 940MX with 2GB of dedicated GDDR5 VRAM, 12GB DDR4 Dual Channel Memory, 256GB SSD, Secure Digital (SD) card reader, Acer True Harmony High-Performance Sound System, Two built-in stereo speakers with subwoofer and built-in dual microphones, 802.11ac Wi-Fi featuring 2x2 MU-MIMO technology (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz), Bluetooth 4.0, HD Webcam (1280 x 720), Acer Fingerprint Reader supporting Windows Hello, 1 - USB 3.1 (Type C) port (Gen 1 up to 5 Gbps), 2 - USB 3.0 Ports (One with Power-off Charging), 1 - USB 2.0 port, 1 - HDMI port with HDCP support, 4-cell Li-Ion Battery (3220 mAh), Up to 9-hours Battery Life, 4.74 lbs. | 2.15 kg (system unit only), Microsoft Signature (NX.GP7AA.001).
feature_bullets: 7th Generation Intel Core i7-7500U Processor (Up to 3.5GHz)
15.6" Full HD (1920 x 1080) Multi-touch widescreen LED-backlit IPS display
NVIDIA GeForce 940MX with 2GB of dedicated GDDR5 VRAM
12GB DDR4 Memory, 256GB SSD. Supports SDXC card reader. Up to 9-hours Battery Life
Operating system is windows 10 home and operating system architecture is 64-bit

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars436 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
